name: Auto Parts
description: A manufacturer auto parts website with Express JS backend, firebase authentication, a dashboard.
subtitle: A manufacturer auto parts website with Express JS backend and Firebase authentication. Developed a payment system using stripe for users to pay for their orders. Implemented different dashboard features for admin and non-admin users.

name: Sports Gear
description: A website for sports gear warehouse that has firebase authentication. Users can add or delete products.
subtitle: A website for a warehouse that has different sports gear in their inventory. Implemented an authentication system using Firebase. Users can add or remove products.

name: Sylhet Safari
description: A website for an individual who serves as a tour guide. The site has authentication system and looks nice.
subtitle: A website for an individual who serves as a tour guide. Implemented an authentication system using Firebase before booking a tour guide. Service cards are a bit unique and the whole site looks beautiful.
